typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Country as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		Province as string,
		City as string,
		CityCode as string,
		Lat as string,
		Lon as string,
		Confirmed as string,
		Deaths as string,
		Recovered as string,
		Active as string,
		Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source(output(
		Date as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		Deaths as integer '000',
		Recoveries as integer '000',
		{Total confirmed} as integer '000'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source2
source1 derive(Fecha = split(Date,'T')[1],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> JsonToColumns
JsonToColumns select(mapColumn(
		Country,
		Confirmed,
		Deaths,
		Recovered,
		Active,
		Date = Fecha
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DeleteNullData
source2 derive(Country = toString('mexico'),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> InsertColumnCountry
DeleteNullData select(mapColumn(
		Country,
		Confirmed,
		Deaths,
		Recovered,
		Date
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReduceData
ReduceData derive(Date = toDate(Date, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		Confirmed = toInteger(Confirmed),
		Deaths = toInteger(Deaths),
		Recovered = toInteger(Recovered),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ChangeFormat
InsertColumnCountry derive(Deaths = iif(isNull(Deaths), 0, Deaths),
		Recoveries = iif(isNull(Recoveries), 0, Recoveries),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> InputNull
InputNull select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Deaths,
		Recovered = Recoveries,
		Confirmed = {Total confirmed},
		Country
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MapColumns
ChangeFormat aggregate(Min_Deaths = min(Deaths),
		Max_Deaths = max(Deaths),
		Min_Confirmed = min(Confirmed),
		Max_Confirmed = max(Confirmed),
		Min_Recovered = min(Recovered),
		Max_Recovered = max(Recovered),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MinMaxSource1
ChangeFormat derive(Deaths = (Deaths-0)/(221052-0),
		Confirmed = (Confirmed-1)/(8273296-1),
		Recovered = (Recovered-0)/(3295148-0),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Scale
MapColumns aggregate(Min_Deaths = min(Deaths),
		Max_Deaths = max(Deaths),
		Min_Confirmed = min(Confirmed),
		Max_Confirmed = max(Confirmed),
		Min_Recovered = min(Recovered),
		Max_Recovered = max(Recovered),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MinMaxSource2
MapColumns derive(Deaths = (Deaths-0)/(86893-0),
		Confirmed = (Confirmed-11)/(860714-11),
		Recovered = (Recovered-0)/(627584-0),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, Scale union(byName: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1))~> Final
Final sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
